scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/app.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node22 --format=esm --packages=external --outfile=dist/app.mjs
scripts.zip: cp package.json package-lock.json dist/ && cd dist && npm ci --omit=dev && zip -q -r function.zip app.mjs node_modules package.json
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
